title: Border Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on satin weave and cording
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of cream-colored satin embroidered in a floral pattern of blue, rose and cream. Edged top and bottom with narrow picot-edged rose ribbon.
